### 1. Goal
 + To cluster the customers into 3-4 groups 

<br>

### 2. Methodology

 + The following unsupervised learning models were employed: Cohort Analysis, RFM analysis, Kmeans, and Hierarchy model.
 + Based on the analysis results, customers can be segmented into 3 or 4 groups depending on the business requirements.
